channel.title: could on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in could on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-24
item.description: Leak reveals Microsoftâ€™s canceled Windows OS for dual-screen devices (2 minute read) Microsoft was working on a secret pocketable Surface device powered by a custom Windows OS before turning to Android for its Surface Duo.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-17
item.description: Apple reportedly wants to make its own wireless chips for the iPhone (2 minute read) Apple is opening an office in southern California and hiring engineers to work on wireless radios, radio-frequency integrated circuits, and a wireless SoC.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-16
item.description: Reddit files to take the company public (1 minute read) Reddit has started the process of going public by filing a confidential S-1 with the Securities and Exchange Commission.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-12
item.description: Spotify is acquiring an audiobook company (3 minute read) Spotify has announced plans to acquire Findaway for an undisclosed price.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-07
item.description: Amazon is reportedly planning to release an Amazon-branded TV as soon as October (1 minute read) Amazon is planning to release Amazon-branded TVs as soon as October in the US.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-09
item.description: Square is going to make a hardware wallet for bitcoin (1 minute read) Square is making a hardware wallet for bitcoin.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-03
item.description: Apple Watch Could Gain Breakthrough Health Upgrade (2 minute read) Rockley Photonics produces sensors for the Apple Watch.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-31
item.description: Amazon acquires podcast network Wondery (1 minute read) Podcast network Wondery will soon become part of Amazon Music.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-27
item.description: Salesforce is in talks to buy Slack, deal could be announced next week (2 minute read) Slack shares closed almost 38% higher on Wednesday after it was reported that Salesforce was in talks to acquire the company.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-07
item.description: Driving the Polestar 2, the first electric car with a brain by Google (8 minute read) The Polestar 2 is a new luxury electric vehicle from Volvo.
